trends: There has been one other sighting in Gassville
There were no other sightings in Gassville on or around August 20th 1991
divs: sighting detailsthere was a storm in the vicinity of gassville arkansas. the event lasted approx. 30 minutes. the shining glitter floated down as if to settle over the trees foliage. it looked just like a seen from the star trek's transporter. today i was watching an episode of ufos over earth. a person named denise was interviewed about, apparently, the same kind of event. a couple of years later i saw a science documentary on ball lighting. i attributed this event, and excused this sighting due to ball lightning until today. they say, (scientist), ball lighting only last seconds, not minutes. this event was life lasting, and i will never forget it. thanks *(wit's first name removed--cms\sg).
Summary: I witnessed falling glitter over trees
